Rachel getting married
programme.desc: Kada se Kym (Anne Hathaway) vrati u obiteljski dom Buchmana na vjenčanje sestre Rachel (Rosemarie DeWitt), sa sobom donese i dugu povijest osobne krize, obiteljskih sukoba i tragedije. Gomila prijatelja i rodbine mladenaca okupila se na veseli vikend pun gozbe, glazbe i ljubavi, ali Kym – sa zajedljivim gegovima i sklonosti za dramom – katalizator je prikrivenih napetosti u ovoj obiteljskoj dinamici. Bogati i eklektični karakteri ostaju zaštitni znak filmova Jonathana Demmesa. RACHEL SE UDAJE prikazuje iskren, brižljiv i katkada urnebesan obiteljski portret. Redatelj Demme, scenaristica Jenny Lumet i zvjezdana glumačka postava prikazali su dramu ovih teških, ali zanimljivih ljudi s ironičnom privrženošću i bogatim duhom(c)

programme.title: Što muškarci žele
One Night at McCool's
programme.desc: Nakon još jedne burne noći u kafiću McCool's, barmen Randy (Matt Dillon) susreće Jewel (Liv Tyler). Ova izazovna djevojka upravo je izbjegla pokušaj silovanja, te je čak stigla i ubiti napadača kada se ovaj vratio. Nakon burnih događaja Randy odvede Jewel kući, te se između njih rodi ljubavna veza. No, Jewel se pokazala vrlo zahtjevnom ženom. Randy je zbog njenih velikih prohtjeva prisiljen činiti razna razbojstva. U priču se upleće i Randyev rođak Carl (Paul Reiser) kojeg Jewel u potpunosti izluđuje. No on nije jedini, isto se može reći i za detektiva Dehlinga (John Goodman), koji radi na njihovom slučaju(c)

programme.title: Tragovi na duši
The human stain
programme.desc: Coleman Silk ugledni je sveučilišni profesor umirovljen zbog optužbe da je napravio rasistički verbalni ispad. Šokirana, njegova supruga ubrzo umre, a on se zbliži s mnogo mlađom fakultetskom čistačicom Fauniom Farley, razvedenom i duboko traumatiziranom ženom koju problematični bivši suprug, vijetnamski veteran Lester Farley, pokušava uvjeriti da mu se vrati. Sa Silkom prijateljuje nekadašnji pisac uspješnica Nathan Zuckerman, koji dugotrajnu spisateljsku blokadu polako razbija pisanjem Silkove biografije. No nitko ne zna da profesor Silk, kojeg svi znaju kao Židova, skriva veliku i po njega duboko traumatičnu tajnu o svom pravom rasnom porijeklu... Robert Benton jedan je od najuglednijih živućih američkih filmskih autora treće životne dobi, a niz njegovih filmova (Mačka je vidjela ubojicu, Kramer protiv Kramera, Mjesta u srcu, Ničija budala) uživa visoko poštovanje ljubitelja sedme umjetnosti. The Human Stain, adaptacija romana prestižnog američkog suvremenog književnika Phila Rotha, tematizira vječni sukob individualnog i općeg kroz složenu i iznimno dojmljivu priču o potrebi za individualnom autonomnošću i slobodom koja se sukobljava s odanošću vlastitoj obitelji i odgovornosti prema njoj. Priča filma doista je tragična, a suptilnost Bentonove redateljske izvedbe i briljantni glumci rezultiraju potresnim ostvarenjem rijetko viđena emocionalnog intenziteta. U glavnim su ulogama velike zvijezde - Anthony Hopkins (Čovjek-slon, Bounty, Kad jaganjci utihnu, Howards End, Na kraju dana, Hannibal, Amistad) i Nicole Kidman (Opasno more, Dani grmljavine, Udaljeni horizonti, Širom zatvorene oči, Sati, Dogville), a u epizodnima također iznimna glumačka imena - Gary Sinise (Apollo 13, Zmijske oči, Misija na Mars) i Ed Harris (Mjesta u srcu, Pollock, Neprijatelj pred vratima), a spomenimo i sjajan nastup dvoje mladih glumaca kojima se smiješi velika karijera - Wentwortha Millera kao mladog Colemana i Jacinde Barrett kao njegove mladalačke ljubavi

programme.title: Šest stupnjeva odvojenosti
Six degrees of separation
programme.desc: Drama. Flan Kittredge (D. Sutherland), bogati trgovac umjetninama i njegova žena Ouisa (S. Channing) na vjenčanju prepričavaju prijateljima neobične događaje od prošle večeri. Dok im je u gostima bio prijatelj i poslovni suradnik Geoffrey Miller (I. McKellen), na vratima se pojavio crni mladić (W. Smith) koji se predstavio kao prijatelj njihove djece s Harvarda i sin Sidneya Poitiera, Paul Poitier. Tvrdio je da je napadnut i opljačkan u Central Parku i od njih zatražio pomoć. Flan i Ouisa previli su mu ranu, dali čistu košulju i ponudili da prespava kod njih. Zauzvrat, Paul im je skuhao ukusnu večeru te njih i njihova prijatelja cijelu večer zabavljao pričama o svome ocu, filmovima i knjigama, a pokazao je i da zna mnogo o njima samima. Sljedećeg jutra, Ouisa je čula neobične zvukove i zatekla Paula u krevetu s nepoznatim muškarcem. Šokirani i ljuti, Kittredgeovi su obojicu izbacili iz stana. Nekoliko dana poslije vjenčanja kojem su prisustvovali Flan i Ouisa doznali su da se gotovo ista stvar dogodila i njihovim prijateljima, te su zajedno prijavili slučaj policiji. No budući da im iz stana ništa nije nestalo, policija ne može pokrenuti istragu... Naslov "Šest stupnjeva odvojenosti" dolazi od teorije koja se spominje u filmu, o tome kako bilo koje dvije osobe na svijetu povezuje lanac od najviše šest ljudi. Scenarij je napisao John Guare, prema vlastitom kazališnom komadu koji je s velikim uspjehom prikazivan u New Yorku i Londonu, a film je režirao američki redatelj australskog podrijetla Fred Schepisi (Krik u tami, Ruska kuća, Sve ostaje u obitelji). Mladi Will Smith dobro se snašao u svojoj prvoj većoj filmskoj ulozi, znatno ozbiljnijoj od onih u njegovim kasnijim filmovima. Glumica Stockard Channing, koja je Ouisu glumila i u kazalištu, za svoju je ulogu nominirana za Oscara i Zlatni globus

programme.title: Apollo 13
programme.desc: Godine 1969. slavni astronaut Neil Armstrong zakoračio je na Mjesec i tako potvrdio američku tehnološku superiornost nad suparničkim SSSR-om. Američka je vlast nastavila pripremati misije na Mjesec, a uskoro je došao red i na trinaestu misiju u sklopu svemirskog programa Apollo. Astronauti Lovell, Haise i Mattingly šest su se mjeseci pripremali za ovaj let. Dva tjedna prije lansiranja misija se susrela s prvim problemom kad je Mattinglyju liječnik zabranio sudjelovanje zbog zdravstvenih problema. Zamijenio ga je mladi i relativno neiskusni astronaut Swigert i sve je opet bilo spremno za polijetanje 13. travnja 1970. Lansiranje je prošlo bez problema, ali i bez interesa javnosti koja je bila zadovoljena Armstrongovim uspjehom. Ali, posada se vrlo brzo javila s prvim problemima. Brod je neobjašnjivo počeo gubiti kisik i struju i tako doveo misiju u pitanje, a živote astronauta u opasnost

programme.title: Razum i osjećaji
Sense and sensibility
programme.desc: Specijalnost spisateljice Jane Austin bili su ljubavni romani smješteni u njoj blizak svijet engleske provincijske aristokracije s kraja 18. i početka 19. stoljeća, a ovom sjajnom ekranizacijom njezina knjiga 'Razum i osjećaji' ponovno postaje bestseler. Spolna diskriminacija početkom 19. stoljeća dio je svakodnevice, a protagonistice ove drame osjećaju je na svojoj koži. Nakon smrti starog Dashwooda sve nekretnine pripadnu njegovom sinu iz prvog braka, dok se druga supruga i kćeri moraju snalaziti kako znaju i umiju. Iako utočište pronađu kod suosjećajnih rođaka, njihovim problemima ne nazire se kraj. Elinore i Marianne sada se suočavaju s činjenicom da loše materijalne prilike uvjetuju i prepreke udaji. Ipak, one uspiju pronaći muškarce svojih života - Elinore bogatog Edwarda Ferrarsa, a Marianne mladog Willoughbyja

programme.title: Tigar i zmaj
Crouching tiger, hidden dragon
programme.desc: Mjesto i vrijeme radnje: Kina, 19. stoljeće. Legendarni ratnik, Li Mu Bai (Chow Yun-Fat), umorio se od dugogodišnjeg traganja za ubojicom svojeg učitelja i odlučio posvetiti duhovnoj strani borilačke vještine. Na putu do prijatelja kojem kani ostaviti svoj čuveni mač, "Zeleni usud", Li Mu Bai sreće staru ljubav Yu Shu Lien (Michelle Yeoh), ratnicu kojoj nikada nije izrekao svoje prave osjećaje. Ponovno zbližavanje prekida drska krađa mača, kojeg otuđi mlada Jen (Zhang Ziyi). Ona se pokaže iznimno talentiranom za borilačke vještine, ali privučena snagom mača, Jen klizi prema tamnoj strani vještine. Sukob s Yu Shu Lien neizbježan je, a niti Li Mu Bai više ne može stajati po strani... Od trenutka kad je izazvao spontani pljesak publike na filmskom festivalu u Cannesu, pa do Oscara za najbolji strani film, fotografiju, glazbu i scenografiju, bilo je jasno kako je riječ o iznimnom ostvarenju koje je otvorilo novu stranicu filmske povijesti. Ang Lee je, na samo njemu svojstven, unikatan način, isprepleo niti ljubavi, moći, osvete, mržnje i sazrijevanja u jedinstven vizualni događaj, pretvorivši naizgled ružno pače kung-fu kinematografije u prekrasnog labuda posve novog žanra. Leejeva briga za ostavštinu vidna je u angažiranju Cheng Pei-Pei, glumice koja je u šezdesetima bila svojevrstan pandan današnjoj Michelle Yeoh, a koja je, nažalost, imala dug prekid glumačke karijere. Izbor suradnika također se pokazao presudnim za ovo remek-djelo, počevši od legendarnog Yuen Woo-Pinga, zaduženog za borilačku koreografiju koja zaustavlja dah, preko nezaboravne glazbe Tan Duna, pa sve do glumaca. Iako se za glavnu ulogu pomišljalo na Jet Lija, na koncu je ipak izabran karizmatični Chow Yun-Fat. Njegova je družica i ljubav u filmu Michelle Yeoh, poznata i kao Bondova djevojka, danas vlasnica filmske producentske tvrtke. I na kraju, Zhang Ziyi, bez koje film ne bi bio isti: bivša je balerina i mlada glumica savršeno odigrala kompleksnu Jen, uvjerljivo predočivši traume mladosti i zanesenost brzim uspjesima. Ne treba zaboraviti, naposljetku, kako je privlačnost između Jen i velikog Li Mu Baija, u velikoj mjeri istinsko gorivo filma, trenutak koji približava nepobjedivog ratnika svjetovnim užicima i, možda, razjašnjava konačnu tragediju

programme.title: Besplatna vožnja
Free Ride
programme.desc: U potrazi za boljim životom za svoju obitelj te u očajničkoj želji da pobjegne iz burne veze, Christina (Anna Paquin) nepromišljeno se seli na Floridu i uvlači u opasno podzemlje i svijet droge. Ubrzo saznaje da preprodaja droge u zlatno doba krijumčara u južnoj Floridi ima svoju cijenu. Budući da joj je policija na tragu, mora pronaći način kako da na vrijeme spasi život koji je teškom mukom sagradila

programme.title: To Kill For
programme.desc: A maverick cop sets out to solve a brutal murder, and falls prey to a dangerous sexual obsession

programme.title: Stevie
programme.desc: The film version of Hugh Whitemore's London stage play about reclusive British poetess Stevie Smith, who lives in a mundane apartment with her doting, slightly mentally unbalanced aunt

programme.title: Kuća na putu
Road House
programme.desc: Dalton je ekpert za održavanje reda u barovima, bez ličnog uplitanja u tuču. On prihvata posao u Drumskoj kafani, ali stvari se komplikuju... Njegov pokušaj da sredi situaciju u kafani, stvara mu konflikt sa Bredom Veslijem, grubijanom i bogatašem... Stvari se zaoštravaju.

programme.title: The Black Stallion Returns
programme.desc: A teenager loses his horse in Morocco and gets him back after various daredevil adventures

programme.title: Bucktown, U.S.A.
programme.desc: A blaxploitation film set in a Southern community called Bucktown, where white police officers bully and extort money from the black population. Finally, one black man instigates a revolt against the Establishment

programme.title: Breakin'
programme.desc: 'Breakin': A struggling young jazz dancer (Lucinda Dickey) meets up with two break-dancers. Together they become the sensation of the street crowds. Features ICE-T in his film debut as a club MC. !??

programme.title: Breakin' 2: Electric Boogaloo
programme.desc: The return of breakdance sensations Turbo, Kelly and Ozone. This time they're saving a local community center from greedy politicians and bulldozers. Organizing a massive street dance, our heroes stop the demolition and save the center

programme.title: Stevie
programme.desc: The film version of Hugh Whitemore's London stage play about reclusive British poetess Stevie Smith, who lives in a mundane apartment with her doting, slightly mentally unbalanced aunt

programme.title: The Raven
programme.desc: The sorcerer Craven learns from fellow magician Dr. Bedlo that his supposedly dead wife is alive and living at the castle of master sorcerer Dr. Scarabus

programme.title: Life Of Sin
programme.desc: Pablo, a Caribbean peasant and Isabel, a politician's mistress, open a brothel that becomes internationally famous. Though they gain wealth and power, the one thing that Isabel seeks continues to elude her - acceptance by the church. Rejected by the Church and betrayed by Pablo, Isabel suffers a devastating fall from grace, which leads to her ultimate death

programme.title: Full Moon In Blue Water
programme.desc: Floyd, the owner of a bar on the Texas coast, has been depressed for a year after his wife disappeared in a swimming accident.

programme.title: Sweet Revenge (Mpca)
Sweet Revenge
programme.desc: Boone is a dashing and suave adventurer who lives for good times and danger. When Nancy Allen and two other beautiful woman are captured and forced into a white slavery operation, Boone uses his brain and brawn to rescue them from well-armed villians

programme.title: Afera Thomasa Crowna
Thomas Crown Affair
programme.desc: Atraktivan, šarmantan, napet i zabavan romantični krimić u kojem lijepa detektivka pokušava raskrinkati neodojlivog milijunaša kradljivca. Thomas Crown (P. Brosnan) dokoni je multimilijunaš koji može imati sve što poželi, uključujući i žene. Stoga se bavi neobičnim hobijem - krađom umjetnina. To radi "za svoju dušu", pedantno planira i izvodi s lakoćom. Kad ukrade Monetovu sliku iz njujorškog muzeja Metropolitan, nanjuše ga detektiv Michael McCann (D. Leary) i Catherine Banning (R. Russo), predstavnica osiguravateljske kompanije koja krađom ove slike gubi mnogo novca. Catherine je inteligentna i odlučna u namjeri uhvatiti krivca, te, pristupivši Crownu, od njega uopće ne krije svoje namjere da pošto-poto vrati sliku vlasniku. Međutim, Thomasu ne treba mnogo da zavede Catherine, ali i ona očara njega. Uskoro njihove privatne sklonosti i profesionalni zadatak postanu nepomirljive suprotnosti... Inteligentna priča i duhoviti dijalozi oznake su ovog zabavnog filma, remakea istoimenoga naslova Normana Jewisona iz 1968. godine, sa Steveom McQueenom i Faye Dunaway u glavnim ulogama (koja se ovdje pojavljuje u ulozi Crownove psihijatrice). Redatelj je filma John McTiernan, poznat po slavnoj trilogiji "Umri muški", zatim "13. ratniku", "Lovu na Crveni oktobar", "Ubojitim namjerama" itd. Glavni lik ovog filma, Thomas Crown, vrlo je sličan Jamesu Bondu, iako je možda nešto skloniji duhovitim i oštroumnim dijalozima nego akcijskom adrenalinu. Glamurozan, razigran, "gozba za oči", ovaj je film romansa u igri mačke i miša, izrazito bliska duhu Bondova serijala, te "Klopci" sa Seanom Conneryjem i Catherine Zeta-Jones. Film je prepun iznenađenja i obrata, koji neće iznevjeriti ni zahtjevniju publiku. Bio je nominiran za Zlatni satelit u kategoriji najbolje glazbe (Bill Conti) te dobitnik Blockbuster Entertainment Award u kategorijama najboljeg glumca (Pierce Brosnan), glumice (Rene Russo) i sporednoga glumca (Denis Leary)

programme.title: Dead Man Walking
programme.desc: A compelling true story based on the experience of Sister Helen Prejean, a Catholic nun caught in a moral crisis. Her role as a spiritual advisor to a convicted murderer on death row leads her to become an outspoken advocate against the death penalty, but her confrontation with the grieving families of his victims throws her into a deeper crisis of faith than she could ever have imagined. Oscar-winning American drama from 1995

programme.title: Fargo
programme.desc: Floyd responds to Kansas City's proposal, and Hanzee takes a road trip. Meanwhile, Lou has a moment of realisation. Noah Hawley's black comedy drama inspired by the Coen brothers' film of the same name, starring Patrick Wilson, Ted Danson, Nick Offerman, Jean Smart and Kirsten Dunst

programme.title: Truck Turner
programme.desc: Isaac Hayes is a bounty hunter who is after a strong-armed pimp who has skipped bail. In the hunt, the pimp is killed but his girlfriend takes a contract out on Hayes

programme.title: High Tide
programme.desc: A singer gets stranded in a small town when she loses her job and her car breaks down all in the same day. She winds up staying in a trailer park only to encounter, by chance, the teenage daughter she deserted following the death of her husband

programme.title: Truck Turner
programme.desc: Isaac Hayes is a bounty hunter who is after a strong-armed pimp who has skipped bail. In the hunt, the pimp is killed but his girlfriend takes a contract out on Hayes

programme.title: The Earthling
programme.desc: Patrick Foley has been on the move all his live. Tired of drifting, he wants to spend his last days in an isolated Australian valley where he grew up.

programme.title: Pandemonium
programme.desc: In this spoof of slasher films, a mad killer haunts the campus of It Had To Be U (a school for cheerleaders), murdering the students in various silly ways

programme.title: Ljubav i smrt
Love and death
programme.desc: Još kao dječak Boris Grushenko (W. Allen) se razlikovao od drugih. Umjesto gužve i tučnjave zanimale su ga poezija i leptiri. Jedina osoba koja slično razmišlja i s kojom može satima voditi pseudointelektualne razgovore njegova je dalja rođakinja Sonja (Diane Kaeton). Boris ju voli ali ona mu ne uzvraća osjećaje i zaljubljena je u njegovog brata Ivana. Razočarana kada se Ivan oženi drugom djevojkom, udaje se za starog trgovca i ima brojne ljubavnike. Kada izbije rat s Napoleonom Boris mora u vojsku. Budući da je velika kukavica, bježi usred bitke ali spletom okolnosti postaje junak jer slučajno ubije nekoliko francuskih generala. Nakon toga vraća se u Moskvu gdje provodi vatrenu noć s najljepšom ženom u gradu, groficom Alexandrovnom (O. Georges-Picot). Sutradan ga na dvoboj izaziva njezin ljubomorni ljubavnik. Uvjeren u vlastitu smrt, Boris odlazi Sonji te ona napokon pristane udati se za njega. Boris preživi dvoboj i oženi se sa Sonjom. Njih su dvoje sretni sve dok ponovno ne izbije rat s Francuskom. Umjesto bijega Boris i Sonja odlučuju ubiti Napoleona (J. Tolkan) i tako riješiti stvar... Vrlo dobra parodija na brojna djela ruske literature. Film sadrži i brojne vizualne reference na poznate redatelje poput Eisensteina i Ingmara Bergmanna.Woody Allen i Diane Keaton izvrstan su komičarski par

programme.title: High Tide
programme.desc: A singer gets stranded in a small town when she loses her job and her car breaks down all in the same day. She winds up staying in a trailer park only to encounter, by chance, the teenage daughter she deserted following the death of her husband

Oscar-winning American drama from 1995

programme.title: Prljava igra
Play dirty
programme.desc: Sjevernoafrička bojišnica u Drugom svjetskom ratu. Satnik britanske vojske Douglas (M. Caine) dobiva zadatak u najkraćem roku probiti se kroz položaje Trećeg Reicha i uništiti neprijateljeve zalihe goriva kako bi se usporilo napredovanje Rommelove armije prema Egiptu. No, Douglasovi su vojnici sve samo ne uobičajena vojna postrojba. Čine je zatvorenici i plaćenici koje Britanci pod zapovjedništvom brigadira Blorea (H. Andrews) namjerno šalju u pogibeljni zadatak. Osim toga, Douglas se neprestance sukobljava s nesklonim mu pukovnikom Mastersom (N. Green), pa mu se zadatak sve više čini uzaludnom misijom, osobito kada shvati da je postrojba izdana... Tematski vrlo nalik filmu Roberta Aldricha "Dvanaestorica žigosanih", snimljen godinu dana ranije, ova britanska ratna drama redatelja Andréa De Totha (I Mongoli, Last of the Comanches) uspješno kombinira elemente ratne priče i pravog pustolovnog filma. De Toth, podrijetlom Mađar, najpoznatiji je po scenariju za film "The Gunfighter" za koji je nominiran za Oscara, a realiziravši u međunarodnoj koprodukciji niz povijesnih spektakala, upravo je u ovom filmu efektno spojio svoj osjećaj za vizualnu atraktivnost i dosljedno razvijanje napetosti. Priča o britanskoj vojnoj postrojbi koja na sjevernoafričkom bojištu srlja u pogibeljni zadatak uistinu djeluje scenaristički elaborirano i režijski vrlo vješto. Glavni joj je glumački adut nastup britanske međunarodne zvijezde i dvostrukog oskarovca Michaela Cainea (Hannah i njezine sestre, Kućna pravila) u ulozi požrtvovnog satnika Douglasa koji jednako brine i o važnom zadatku, i o svojim vojnicima. Caineovi su partneri uvjerljivi Nigel Davenport (Sebastian, No Blade of Grass) i Harry Andrews (The Hill, The Agony and the Ecstasy), dok je skladatelj višestruki oskarovac Michel Legrand (Yentl, Summer of '42). Film je realiziran na lokacijama u Španjolskoj, te u britanskim filmskim studijima Shepperton. Koscenarist filma je Britanac Melvyn Bragg koji se kasnije proslavio televizijskim intervjuima sa slavnim filmašima, te scenarijima za filmove "The Music Lovers" i "Jesus Christ Superstar"

programme.title: Psi rata
The Dogs of War
programme.desc: Ratna drama o vojnoj misiji na afričku zemlju Zangaro. Nemilosrdan vojni plaćenik Shannon (Christopher Walken) biva poslan na izvidnicu u zapadnoafričku državu Zangaro kako bi promotrio tamošnju političku situaciju zbog investiranog novca u tu zemlju. Pretvara se da je fotograf rijetkih vrsta ptica, no ipak ga u špijunaži uhvati predsjednička tajna policija te ga, prije deportacije natrag u Sjedinjene države, prebije, gotovo na smrt. Odlučan u namjeri da uzvrati udarac smjenjivanjem samog predsjednika Kimbe, Shannon okuplja šačicu vojnika da mu se pridruži u osvetničkoj misiji

programme.title: Američka pita: Knjiga ljubavi
American Pie: The Book of Love
programme.desc: Uz pomoć knjige skrivene u školskoj knjižnici tri dečka pokušavaju izgubiti nevinost - no knjiga se ošteti i njezini savjeti postaju dvojbeni

programme.title: Monk
programme.desc: Adrian Monk (Emmyjem ovjenčani Tony Shalhoub) detektiv je golemih sposobnosti čiju karijeru ugrožavaju njegovi još veći strahovi od mikroba, velikih masa, malih mjesta i gotovo svega drugoga. Takav poremećaj kod Monka izazvalo je ubojstvo njegove obožavane supruge Trudy. Nakon prisilnog odlaska iz policije Monk upošljava medicinsku sestru koja mu pomaže da se vrati u policiju i usput postaje njegov neuobičajeni dr. Watson. Kad policija ne uspijeva razriješiti težak slučaj, ne preostaje ništa drugo nego obratiti se najsposobnijem za taj posao... Sa svim njegovim fobijama. 1. epizoda Monka izluđuje susjedovo neprestano sviranje klavira. Ne može spavati niti se potužiti dr. Krogeru koji je nedavno preminuo. Na rubu očaja Monk priželjkuje slučaj koji bi mu odvratio misli od glazbe i nailazi na sumnjivu nesreću ostarjelog Josepha Moodyja koji je umro pavši niz stube u vlastitoj kući. Monk odlazi u Moodyjevu kuću gdje mu pokojnikova nećakinja govori da je u trenutku smrti bio uz svoju medicinsku sestru. Međutim, Monka više zanima kuća koju nećakinja kani prodati. Nekoliko dana poslije Monk posjećuje novog psihijatra, prijatelja i kolegu dr. Krogera, dr. Nevena Bella, koji uoči koliko je smrt dr. Krogera pogodila Monka te mu savjetuje da ne kupuje kuću u tako teškom emocionalnom stanju. Monk ga ne posluša, kupi kuću i upadne u nesvakidašnju zamku tipičnog kućevlasnika.

programme.title: Doyleova republika
Republic of Doyle
programme.desc: Jakea uzimaju za taoca i prinude ga da istražuje opasno razbojstvo iznutra. Rose i Desu postaje sumnjivo Sloanino tajnovito ponašanje

programme.desc: Veliki glumac prati Dannyja u sklopu svoga istraživanja za predstojeći film. Danny se tomu opire, no njihov odnos dovodi do iznenađujućeg otkrića

programme.title: Monk
programme.desc: Linda Kloster, supruga šahovskog velemajstora Patricka Klostera, zna da njezin genijalni muž kani izvesti savršeno ubojstvo u kojem bi ona trebala biti žrtva te moli Monka da joj obeća da se Patrick neće izvući nekažnjeno. Iako je Patrick u Kanadi i ne postoji izravna prijetnja smrću, Linda Kloster ipak je mrtva. Obdukcija pokaže da je Linda umrla prirodnom smrću, ali Monk zna da je ubijena. U potrazi za bilo kakvim dokazom protiv Patricka Klostera Monk i Natalie upoznaju mladog šahista koji je jednom davno odigrao partiju s velemajstorom i izgubio je zbog poteza poznatog kao otrovni pješak - dovoljno da Monk riješi slučaj, ali ne i da Patrick Kloster odgovara za ubojstvo

programme.title: Haven
programme.desc: Neobične se stvari zbivaju u gradu Havenu u saveznoj državi Maine. Tamošnje stanovnike progone natprirodne pojave poznate po nazivu 'Neprilike'

programme.title: Odbjegla nevjesta
Runaway bride
programme.desc: Glas o Maggie Carpenter (J. Roberts), nevjesti koja je uspjela pobjeći s tri vjenčanja, dospio je i do omiljenoga kafića poznatoga newyorškoga kolumnista i umjerenoga ženomrsca Ikea Grahama (R. Gere). Nakon što novinar intrigantnu temu zajedljivo obradi u svojoj kolumni, povrijeđena djevojka prosvjeduje kod glavne urednice. Suočen s mogućnošću tužbe, popularni dnevnik otkazuje daljnju suradnju svojoj dojučerašnjoj zvijezdi. Ike odlazi u djevojčin gradić i pokušava otkriti nove pojedinosti koje bi mu dale za pravo i spasile unosno radno mjesto. Ubrzo se sprijateljuje s Maggienom obitelji i prijateljima, odnosno s cijelim mjestom koje potresa uzbuđenje zbog priprema za još jedno vjenčanje. Hoće li nevjesta ponovno pobjeći? Jasno da hoće, ali u sljedećemu pokušaju na red dolazi stanoviti revni pripadnik sedme sile. Lovac se uhvatio u stupicu koju je sam pripremao. Svadbeni marš zasvirat će i njemu... "Odbjegla nevjesta" uzorna je melodrama o privlačnoj djevojci čije ljubavi redom završavaju pred oltarom, ali ne i u braku, te velegradskom novinaru koji neočekivano pada sa svoga nedodirljivoga pijedestala. Snimljena je prema scenariju starih suradnica Josann MacGibbon i Sare Pariott (Worth Wining, The Favor), a u režiji Garryja Marshalla. I sam iskusni glumac (među inim i u TV serijalima Murphy Brown, Tri sestre, Monk, Sabrina, the Teenage Witch), producent (Grasshoper, Tko čuva dijete) i scenarist (The Flamingo Kid, Ljubav na američki način), Marshall je devet godina poslije "Zgodne žene", u kojoj je uz Juliju Roberts i Richarda Gerea i sam sudjelovao, odlučio pokušati ponoviti neočekivani uspjeh jedne od najvećih filmskih uspješnica s početka devedestih. Primijenivši prokušanu formulu, s dvoje privlačnih i popularnih protagonista u romantičnoj priči u kojoj se izmjenjuju humor i suze, nije mogao promašiti. "Odbjegla nevjesta" i danas funkcionira besprijekorno kao zabavan eskapistički predah

programme.title: As u rukavu 2: Maska ubojice
Smokin' aces 2: assassins' ball
programme.desc: Nagrada je raspisana i svi žele njegovu glavu. Hal Leuco (Fred Henderson) pod svaku cijenu želi FBI agenta Waltera Weeda (Tom Berenger) mrtvog pa za njegovu glavu raspiše veliku nagradu. Glas se brzo širi, a lovci na ucijenjene glave počinju potragu. Lester (Maury Sterling) i Fritz Tremor (Michael Parks) uvijek su spremni na svaki izazov, no nisu jedini koji će pokušati likvidirati Weeda. Tu je i lijepa, ali smrtonosna Ariella Martinez (Martha Higareda), psihotični ubojica Finbar McTeague (Vinnie Jones) te Lazlo Soot (Tommy Flanagan). Svi oni žele novac pa će biti pravo čudo ako agent Weed doživi svitanje. Na tragu prvog dijela, “ As u rukavu 2” ponavlja ludilo prethodnika, namjerno imitirajući produkciju niskobudžetnih britanskih gangsterskih filmova. Dakle, dobili smo bezumnu dobro režiranu pucačinu kakvu smo mogli očekivati, što je upravo tip zabave koju smo tražili od ovakvog filma. Jedino Tommy Flanagan ponavlja ulogu iz prvog dijela, dok se ovoga puta u glavnoj ulozi našao poznati Tom Berenger. Tu je i Vinnie Jones, bivši nogometaš, koji se, izgleda, pretplatio na tip uloga koje je isporučio u “Lopovi, ubojice i dvije nabijene puške” te “Zdrpi i briši

programme.title: Monk
programme.desc: Pročitavši dobitnu kombinaciju loto brojeva, hostesa Marissa Kessler istrči iz televizijskog studija u strahu za život. Međutim, tajnoviti napadač je sustiže i ubije. Monk odmah uviđa da nije riječ o slučajnosti. Za vrijeme istrage voditelj TV postaje zapazi Natalie te joj ponudi mjesto nove loto djevojke do raspisivanja audicije. Monk nevoljko pristane te Natalie ima priliku zasjati na novom poslu. Novostečena slava ometa njezin odnos s Monkom, a posvađa se i s tonskim majstorom Billyjem Loganom koji istoga trenutka dobiva otkaz. Nedugo zatim Logan posjećuje lutrijskog fanatika Malcolma O'Dwyera optuženoga za ubojstvo Marisse Kessler kojega ubije.

programme.title: 40 dana i 40 noći
programme.desc: Dok se razina mora na Zemlji podiže, mikrobiologinja surađuje s vojskom na pokušaju gradnje nove Arke

programme.title: Pravedno i prema zakonu
Fairly legal
programme.desc: U drugoj sezoni serije "Pošteno i prema zakonu" temperamentna i atraktivna posrednica Kate Reed (Sarah Shahi) suočava se s novim izazovom i potencijalnom burnom romancom utjelovljenom u liku oštrog, energičnog i ambicioznog parničara Bena Grogana, kojeg tumači novi član stalne glumačke postave Ryan Johson. Angažirala ga je Kateina partnerica Lauren Reed (Virginia Williams) kako bi spasila njihov ured s ruba propasti, no Benova prisutnost samo je ulje na vatru Kateinom već poljuljanom odnosu s maćehom vršnjakinjom, a opterećuje i njezin odnos s Justinom Patrickom (Michael Trucco) od kojeg će se uskoro i sudski razvesti. I dok Benova agresivnost sažima sve zbog čega Kate mrzi odvjetnike, seksualna napetost i kemija između njih dvoje ne da se poreći. Strastan borac za pravdu, Kate nastavlja križarski rat protiv beskonačne birokracije i svakodnevnih nepravdi u sistemu, a nekonvencionalnim metodama, beskompromisnim pristupom te pravnim znanjem rješava sukobe usprkos širokom dijapazonu protivnika. Kateina je specijalnost da ljudima pruži ono što trebaju i izbori "istinsku pobjedu", pa tako jednako vješto balansira u korporativnim sporovima gdje su na kocki milijuni dolara, u intimnim obiteljskim zavadama kao i u svemu što se nađe između te dvije krajnosti. Takve situacije često na kušnju stavljaju Kateinog tajnika, Leonarda Princea (Baron Vaughn), utjelovljenje štreberskog šika. U ovoj sezoni ponovno ćemo gledati Geralda McRaneya kao suca Nicastra i Esaija Moralesa kao tužioca Aarona Davidsona. Osim njih u epizodnim ulogama pojavljuju se Mark Moses i Barry Shabaka Henley. Izvršni producenti serije su Steve Stark i Peter Ocko, a ove sezone kao producent i redatelj pridružuje im se i američki veteran Anton Cropper. --- 1. epizoda: Mjesec dana nakon što je dobila otkaz, Kate se trijumfalno vraća u Reed & Reed kao ravnopravna partnerica. Lauren nije presretna, ali ima i većih briga: kako spasiti ured od propasti. Zato ni Kate ne smije izgubiti kontrolu u posredovanju između oboljelog od raka i kemijske tvrtke koja ga je možda namjerno izložila pogibli. Posao joj otežava agresivni i pohlepni odvjetnik Ben Grogan. No čak i ako slučaj uspješno privede kraju, Bena se neće riješiti zato što bi ambiciozni odvjetnik mogao Reed & Reed izvući iz financijskog škripca

programme.title: Tajna afera
Waking up in Reno
programme.desc: Upoznajte Roya (P. Swayze) i Candy (C. Theron) te Lonnie Earla (B.B. Thornton) i Darlene (N. Richardson), dva mlada bračna para koji misle kako se dobro poznaju sve dok ne odluče zajedno otići na izlet iz svojih snova. Kreću na put u posve novom nakrcanom sportskom vozila i zabavljaju se kao nikada u životu. Sve dok se ne dogodi nešto neobično na putu do spektakularnih utrka tegljača u Reno-u, Nevada. Čini se da je Lonnie Earl zaljubljen u Candy, a kada istina izbije na vidjelo, ovaj zabavni izlet doseže svoj vrhunac

programme.title: Buntovnici s ledenog jezera

programme.desc: Ovo je priča o tome kako su svećenik, njegova supruga i 28 siročadi za koje je brinuo izbjegli fatalan tsunami jutro nakon Božića 2004. u Šri Lanki. Pogledajte i kako je ribolovac spasio gotovo 100 utopljenika, žrtava tsunamija

programme.title: Gospodari rata
programme.desc: Sean pregledava par pištolja za dvoboj iz 18. stoljeća, a neki stvarni Vikinzi tvrde da su iskopali sjekiru staru 1000 godina

programme.title: Gospodari rata
programme.desc: Dečki su u Galvestonu u Teksasu, gdje Sean upoznaje vlasnika pištolja Derringer, sličnog onome kojim je ubijen Abraham Lincoln

programme.title: Napušteno
programme.desc: Ekipa istražuje zatvorenu tvornicu papira, ali Jay mora pridobiti vlasnike i dokazati da i on želi očuvati njezinu povijest

programme.title: Taljenje novca
programme.desc: Rich odluči naći dijelove starih raketa jer misli da su izrađeni od plemenitih metala koji mogu izdržati visoke temperature

programme.title: Apokalipsa: Drugi svjetski rat
programme.desc: Dok se rat primiče kraju, Hitlerove se postrojbe povlače pred saveznicima. U međuvremenu Amerika gradi atomsku bombu kako bi porazila Japan

programme.title: Unutar Drugog svjetskog rata
programme.desc: Prve godine Drugog svjetskog rata, od rujna 1933., kada se Hitler obratio nacističkoj stranci u Nurnbergu, do lipnja 1942. i bitke kod Midwaya

programme.title: Brain Games 5
programme.desc: Naš mozak čine brojne strukture, područja i susjedstva koji su u neprestanoj komunikaciji dok upravljaju našim ponašanjem. Tim znanstvenika i taksista vodi Jasona Silvu ulicama Londona da bi mu zorno prikazali kako funkcionira ta nevjerojatna mreža

programme.title: Zvjezdani razgovori 2
programme.desc: Neil deGrasse razgovara s Ginom McCarthy iz američke Agencije za zaštitu okoliša. U raspravi o utjecaju klimatskih promjena i tehnologiji za nadzor i kontrolu okoliša Tysonu se pridružuju komičar Maeve Higgins i novinar Andrew Revkin

programme.title: Megagrađevine
programme.desc: Prelazi naneprohodnijim terenima na velikoj nadmorskoj visini, željeznička pruga Qinghai-Tibet duga 1000 km uzuzetan je graditeljski pothvat

programme.title: Megagrađevine
programme.desc: Prelazi naneprohodnijim terenima na velikoj nadmorskoj visini, željeznička pruga Qinghai-Tibet duga 1000 km uzuzetan je graditeljski pothvat

programme.title: Istrage zrakoplovnih nesreća 11
programme.desc: Otkrivamo kako je 273 ljudi poginulo kad je avion American Airlinesa ostao bez lijevog motora u najtežoj avionskoj nesreći u povijesti SAD-a

programme.title: Znanost budućnosti Stephena Hawkinga
programme.desc: Pogled na to kako se otkrića u tehnologiji primjenjuju na ljude, ne samo zbog učinkovitijih popravaka, nego i za poboljšanje uma

programme.title: Ništa od navedenog
programme.desc: Tim Shaw koristi se znanošću da bi istražio eksplozivnu snagu kozmetičkih proizvoda i najbolji način da nadjača dizača utega iz Venice Beacha

programme.title: Kozmos: Odiseja u svemiru
programme.desc: Dok se putovanje primiče kraju, pripremite se za umni pokus. Uspijete li, zagonetka kozomosa bit će neizbježan rezultat

programme.title: Zona gradnje
programme.desc: Doživite moćnu megadrobilicu. Najveći stroj za recikliranje metala na svijetu za jedan sat može pretvoriti 450 auta u neprepoznatljivu masu

programme.title: Megatvornice - Superauti
programme.desc: Istražite tvornicu Ferrari iza pionirskog modela FF, prvog Ferrarija s pogonom na sva četiri kotača i s četiri udobna sjedala

programme.title: Istrage zrakoplovnih nesreća 11
programme.desc: Kad je u padu aviona tvrtke United Airlines poginulo 10 osoba, istražitelji su otkrili kako je nesreću možda izazvao kvar opreme za slijetanje

programme.title: Sekunde do katastrofe
programme.desc: 1990. požar je izbio na trajektu Scandinavian Star. Mnogi su putnici poginuli. Istražitelji ispituju je li posrijedi nesretan slučaj ili palež

programme.title: Apokalipsa: Hitlerov uspon
programme.desc: Godine 1933. nacistička diktatura proširila se cijelom Njemačkom. Hitler je sada Führer i, dok javno propagira mir, priprema se za rat

programme.title: Apokalipsa: Drugi svjetski rat
programme.desc: Živopisan prikaz Drugog svjetskog rata donosi rijetke snimke iz 1939. godine uključujući invaziju na Poljsku i užasne slike iz geta u Lodzu

programme.title: Autocesta kroz pakao
programme.desc: Prikolica puna skupih lijekova zapela je u ledu. Bruce počinje pokazivati znakove da možda više nije u punoj snazi

programme.title: Brain Games 5
programme.desc: Ova epizoda bavi se vašim mozgom i grijehom. Poigrat ćemo se vašim mozgom kroz seriju igara i eksperimenata kako bismo vam pokazali da vaš mozak može biti predodređen za grijeh, i iako je grijeh loš, još važnije je da ima i svoju pozitivnu stranu

programme.title: Zvjezdani razgovori 2
programme.desc: Neil deGrasse razgovara s Ginom McCarthy iz američke Agencije za zaštitu okoliša. U raspravi o utjecaju klimatskih promjena i tehnologiji za nadzor i kontrolu okoliša Tysonu se pridružuju komičar Maeve Higgins i novinar Andrew Revkin

programme.title: Brain Games 5
programme.desc: Od rođenja do starosti vaš se mozak prilagođava, neprestano se optimizirajući kako biste postizali najbolje moguće rezultate. Vaše pamćenje, perspektiva, čak i percepcija samih sebe dorađuje se u svako doba i često ne onako kako biste očekivali

programme.title: Zvjezdani razgovori 2
programme.desc: Neil deGrasse razgovara s bivšim američkim predsjednikom Billom Clintonom, velikim zagovornikom znanosti obrazovanja i napretka. U raspravi o važnosti znanosti Tysonu se pridružuju komičar Chuck Nice i stručnjak za genomiku Juan Enriquez

programme.title: Preživljavanje na Aljasci
programme.desc: Jedno od najtežih natjecanja nastavlja se, a 12 ljubitelja prirode ogleda se međusobno, s Majkom prirodom i vlastitom voljom da bi preživjeli

programme.title: Brain Games 5
programme.desc: Od rođenja do starosti vaš se mozak prilagođava, neprestano se optimizirajući kako biste postizali najbolje moguće rezultate. Vaše pamćenje, perspektiva, čak i percepcija samih sebe dorađuje se u svako doba i često ne onako kako biste očekivali

programme.title: Lica Biblije
Lost Faces of The Bible
programme.desc: Archaeologists unearthed a shocking discovery while excavating an ancient village in Israel- the skeletal remains of a tiny infant stored inside a clay jar. Six millennia ago, someone carefully buried this child under the foundations of a house- but why? Did a grieving mother decide to keep a child lost too soon close at hand? Or was this innocent sacrificed to appease the gods? In this episode of Lost Faces of the Bible, our team of archaeologists, scholars and forensic anthropologists explore humanity's history of sacrifice, while gathering information to help our forensic artists reveal the face of this mysterious child

programme.title: Neukroćena Amerika
Untamed Americas
programme.desc: Stunning HD cinematography produces an epic yet intimate journey through America's deserts. Everything in the desert lives and dies at the mercy of water. Dry, inhospitable wilderness, they are among the harshest, most extreme environments on the planet. Wind and water sculpt these thirst-lands into natural monuments… as unique as they are spectacular. But look closer and the desert reveals a SECRET WORLD of INTRIGUE… surprising stories of survival, epic perseverance… and things you've never seen before. All of America's deserts provide something… a hidden bounty for those who know where to find it… and how to use it. Title Final Yes

programme.title: Nordijska divljina
Nordic Wild
programme.desc: The shores of Scandinavia stretch for thousands of kilometers. Time and tide shape the land and the lives of the creatures that live here. It is a world of ceaseless change, in which animals live - literally - on the edge

programme.title: Znanost budućnosti Stephena Hawkinga
Stephen Hawking's Science of The Future
programme.desc: Discover a new age where machines talk to machines, sciences come together to form new disciplines, and new connections are made every day

programme.title: Pecanje čudovišta
Monster Fish
programme.desc: Follow Dr Zeb Hogan, National Geographic Explorer and an aquatic biologist on his quest to find what could be the world's largest and most deadly freshwater fish - the giant freshwater stingray. We follow Zeb as he dives with a captive stingray for the very first time and hand feeds this monster of the deep

programme.title: Pripreme za Sudnji dan
Doomsday Preppers
programme.desc: In this episode, we go inside the lives of two different families as they prepare for the end of the world. In rural Colorado we meet Dr. Dave and his wife Dee. They are prepping for an EMP caused by a solar flare, which they fear will lead to widespread illness and death due to the lack of medical care. In the hopes to save his family, Dave is building a mobile pharmacy so he can have a supply of traditional medicine. Next, we meet Richard Huggins in Fort Worth, Texas. He is preparing for Nuclear War by building and fortifying a pillbox with grenade launchers, a machine gun and claymore mines to keep his family safe. We join these two preppers as they as they prepare for Doomsday

programme.title: Znanost glupog, ep. 12
Science of Stupid
programme.desc: Richard Hammond explores the potential to embarrass, injure and humiliate yourself when bungee jumping, juggling or flying a kite

programme.title: Znanost budućnosti Stephena Hawkinga
Stephen Hawking's Science of The Future
programme.desc: Discover a new age where machines talk to machines, sciences come together to form new disciplines, and new connections are made every day

programme.title: Opasni susreti
Dangerous encounters
programme.desc: Romulus Whitaker travels four continents in search of the world's largest crocodiles, encountering gharials, saltwater and Nile crocodiles

programme.title: Opasni susreti
Dangerous encounters
programme.desc: Romulus Whitaker travels four continents in search of the world's largest crocodiles, encountering gharials, saltwater and Nile crocodiles

programme.title: Pripreme za Sudnji dan
Doomsday Preppers
programme.desc: In the ninth episode of Season 3, the preparation for an earthquake in the New Madrid seismic zone takes precedence when it comes to our two families. Both David Mays and David Nash prepare themselves and their families for a destined earthquake. David Mays is a pilot who relies on gadgets to protect his family from advancing destruction and also to provide assistance to neighbors in need. With his drones that he has rigged with cameras and defensive mechanisms, he plans to survey his surroundings on his way to his personal bug-out location. David Nash is a do-it-yourselfer who creates a geodesic dome that will house his family if a quake strikes. His preps include a water purification system, a homemade generator, and the reinforced earthquake shelter that also gathers water

programme.title: Istrage zrakoplovnih nesreća
Air crash investigation
programme.desc: Air France Flight #296 (Airbus A320) June 26th, 1988 The Airbus A-320 the worlds most sophisticated passenger jet takes off for its maiden passenger flight and first-ever public demonstration. The plane is headed for the Habsheim Air Show where the pilots are planning a breathtaking, low-altitude fly-over. But after getting into position over the tiny airfield the exhibition turns to disaster. The plane plows into a forest and is consumed by flames. It is a horrible tragedy, and a public relations nightmare for Airbus. With such a huge investment on the line, there is enormous pressure on investigators to determine whether the pilot or the plane was at fault

programme.title: Sekunde do katastrofe
Seconds from disaster
programme.desc: The use of the atomic bombs in World War II still excites controversy, particularly the necessity for the second bomb on Nagasaki. The argument that it was the only way to bring a swift end to the war, and save thousands of American lives, wins the day in public

programme.title: Evakuirajte Zemlju
Evacuate Earth
programme.desc: Is a "zombie apocalypse" simply a concept of fiction or could an infectious disease REALLY turn humanity into a race of vicious, seething monsters? The truth just might shock you! NGC examines one all too real scenario -- a pandemic caused by a mutated rabies virus. Experts from the fields of medicine, biology and the social sciences explain what could happen if humanity faced a deadly contagion for which there was is no cure. Through stunning dramatizations, watch as the virus makes its way from the depths of the ocean to every corner of the Earth turning humans and animals alike into individual vehicles of brutal destruction

programme.title: Pecanje čudovišta
Monster Fish
programme.desc: There are fish, …and then there are FISH. Lurking in the murky depths of the world's great waterways are bizarre giants-specimens of such enormous proportion and odd appearance they boggle the mind. In his quest to save the world's big fish, aquatic ecologist Zeb Hogan has wrangled some of the biggest freshwater fish in the world. In this episode, we follow him as he goes in search of the biggest and oldest of North America's river monsters: the White Sturgeon

programme.title: Opasni susreti
Dangerous encounters
programme.desc: To study big carnivores, researchers have to get close, very close. But how do you get within arm's length to some of the most dangerous predators on the planet who can easily take down prey that's five times your size? To find out, Dr. Brady Barr creates a protective suit that enables him to crawl alongside a Nile crocodile

programme.title: Lica Biblije
Lost Faces of The Bible
programme.desc: During a time when many societies were transitioning from nomadic lifestyles to more permanent village settlements, a long-lived man was given a special burial in a remote desert cave. Placed around him were various personal objects carefully stained with blood red ochre, including a broken bow, a flint knife, a walking stick and a pair of leather sandals. The presence of weapons inspired the moniker, "The Warrior", but the other artifacts could indicate the roaming existence of a hunter. Six thousand years later, the Lost Faces of the Bible team of archaeologists, forensic anthropologists and artists try to determine how this ancient man lived and what he looked like in his final hours

To find out, Dr. Brady Barr creates a protective suit that enables him to crawl alongside a Nile crocodile

programme.title: Evakuirajte Zemlju
Evacuate Earth
programme.desc: Is a "zombie apocalypse" simply a concept of fiction or could an infectious disease REALLY turn humanity into a race of vicious, seething monsters? The truth just might shock you! NGC examines one all too real scenario -- a pandemic caused by a mutated rabies virus. Experts from the fields of medicine, biology and the social sciences explain what could happen if humanity faced a deadly contagion for which there was is no cure. Through stunning dramatizations, watch as the virus makes its way from the depths of the ocean to every corner of the Earth turning humans and animals alike into individual vehicles of brutal destruction

programme.title: Istrage zrakoplovnih nesreća
Air crash investigation
programme.desc: Air France Flight #296 (Airbus A320) June 26th, 1988 The Airbus A-320 the worlds most sophisticated passenger jet takes off for its maiden passenger flight and first-ever public demonstration. The plane is headed for the Habsheim Air Show where the pilots are planning a breathtaking, low-altitude fly-over. But after getting into position over the tiny airfield the exhibition turns to disaster. The plane plows into a forest and is consumed by flames. It is a horrible tragedy, and a public relations nightmare for Airbus. With such a huge investment on the line, there is enormous pressure on investigators to determine whether the pilot or the plane was at fault

programme.title: Sekunde do katastrofe
Seconds from disaster
programme.desc: The use of the atomic bombs in World War II still excites controversy, particularly the necessity for the second bomb on Nagasaki. The argument that it was the only way to bring a swift end to the war, and save thousands of American lives, wins the day in public

programme.title: Pecanje čudovišta
Monster Fish
programme.desc: There are fish, …and then there are FISH. Lurking in the murky depths of the world's great waterways are bizarre giants-specimens of such enormous proportion and odd appearance they boggle the mind. In his quest to save the world's big fish, aquatic ecologist Zeb Hogan has wrangled some of the biggest freshwater fish in the world. In this episode, we follow him as he goes in search of the biggest and oldest of North America's river monsters: the White Sturgeon

programme.title: Pripreme za Sudnji dan
Doomsday Preppers
programme.desc: In the ninth episode of Season 3, the preparation for an earthquake in the New Madrid seismic zone takes precedence when it comes to our two families. Both David Mays and David Nash prepare themselves and their families for a destined earthquake. David Mays is a pilot who relies on gadgets to protect his family from advancing destruction and also to provide assistance to neighbors in need. With his drones that he has rigged with cameras and defensive mechanisms, he plans to survey his surroundings on his way to his personal bug-out location. David Nash is a do-it-yourselfer who creates a geodesic dome that will house his family if a quake strikes. His preps include a water purification system, a homemade generator, and the reinforced earthquake shelter that also gathers water

programme.title: Evakuirajte Zemlju
Evacuate Earth
programme.desc: Is a "zombie apocalypse" simply a concept of fiction or could an infectious disease REALLY turn humanity into a race of vicious, seething monsters? The truth just might shock you! NGC examines one all too real scenario -- a pandemic caused by a mutated rabies virus. Experts from the fields of medicine, biology and the social sciences explain what could happen if humanity faced a deadly contagion for which there was is no cure. Through stunning dramatizations, watch as the virus makes its way from the depths of the ocean to every corner of the Earth turning humans and animals alike into individual vehicles of brutal destruction

programme.title: Opasni susreti
Dangerous encounters
programme.desc: To study big carnivores, researchers have to get close, very close. But how do you get within arm's length to some of the most dangerous predators on the planet who can easily take down prey that's five times your size? To find out, Dr. Brady Barr creates a protective suit that enables him to crawl alongside a Nile crocodile

programme.title: Pripreme za Sudnji dan
Doomsday Preppers
programme.desc: In Georgia, firefighter Mark believes that the U.S. is under the threat of foreign occupation, specifically by Russia. He already has six months worth of food stored and is skilled at hunting and trapping. Now, hes working on building a modern Trojan horse in order to infiltrate a potential enemy base undetected. In Texas, Joe is preparing for a cyber-attack to take out the countrys telecommunications system. He is prepped with enough food to feed 24 people for two years, a stock of 1,500 gallons of water and a global communications system. His current projects include a post-apocalyptic schoolhouse to be used to educate children if the government collapses after disaster and "gyro-copter" in order to maintain aerial dominance

programme.title: Najteži popravci
World's Toughest Fixes
programme.desc: Riley buys a ticket and joins the crowd. A million commuters… scurrying to and from work… It's a typical day in the fifth largest mass transit system in the USA… and there's a train due somewhere every few seconds. Behind the scenes, the action is even more frantic as thousands of workers struggle to keep this huge system up and running 24/7. Transit controllers, operators, mechanics, electricians, communications experts… all working to monitor, co-ordinate and repair, the thousands of trains, buses, and trolleys that make up this incredibly complex transport matrix

programme.title: AUTO SOS
Car S.O.S
programme.desc: Barry has dreamed of restoring his 1984 Audi UR Quattro, but health issues have left him sapped of energy, so Tim and Fuzz step in to help out

programme.title: Evakuirajte Zemlju
Evacuate Earth
programme.desc: Do amazing breakthroughs in technology bring terrifying new levels of danger to humanity? We this deadly question by exploring some of the dangers posed by one of the most promising new technologies: nano-robotics. This one-houir program postulates an environmental clean-up robot the size of a molecule, which is hacked by a rogue engineer and turned into a spreading, flesh-consuming monster. In this scenario, it becomes clear that the only technology fit to fight back against this nano-robot is another robot a near-microscopic nano-aircraft built by the American military. The nano-weapon does handle the initial threat but when it spins out of control and begins attacking cities around the world, the cure becomes more deadly and world-threatening than the disease. Only by resorting to an improvised weapon radar used to fuse and melt the tiny inner workings of these military robots does humanity escape this gruesome fate

programme.title: Pecanje čudovišta
Monster Fish
programme.desc: They're fish that fly. They are carp from Asia now popping up in America's waterways like zombie attackers from a B-movie. They can jump 10 feet in the air at the sound of a boat motor, turning a day on the water into a boxing match. Bighead and silver carp were first imported into the U-S in the early 1970s. They soon escaped. Now they are in almost half the American states and are on the march toward Canada. Aquatic Ecologist Zeb Hogan is literally dodging flying fish as he tries to discover why these invaders are taking over and if there's anything we can do to stop them

programme.title: Opasni susreti
Dangerous encounters
programme.desc: Classic ambush predators like crocs and snakes use camouflage and speed to capture their prey - sometimes faster than the blink of an eye. How do they do it? To find out, Dr. Brady Barr goes head-to-head with some of the most dangerous ambush predators on the planet. He'll trigger their strikes and film them on high-speed video

programme.title: Preporod afričkoga kraljevstva divljine
programme.desc: US-born, African-raised Wildlife Cameraman Bob Poole begins his two-year filming assignment in Gorongosa National Park, Mozambique. After decades of war, an international team of scientists and conservationists is bringing this once-legendary African national park back to its former glory. Poole's first job is to help sedate a lion and put a GPS-tracking collar around its neck. Lion scientist Paola Bouley needs the GPS-data to solve a baffling mystery: why is Gorongosa's lion population not growing as fast as it should

programme.title: Najjezovitiji ubojice
programme.desc: Giant spiders. Voracious blobs. Swamp things. It's the stuff of horror movies. But these creepy killers are real. And sometimes fact is stranger than fiction

programme.title: Pecanje čudovišta
programme.desc: It's a goldfish the size of a cow, growing up to 600 lbs and 10 feet long. Giant carp is the angler's holy grail, notoriously difficult to catch and lives in just three Southeast Asia's rivers. It's a bizarre monster with a huge head, big mouth and large shiny scales as big as a baby's hand. National Geographic Explorer and aquatic biologist, Zeb Hogan travels to Thailand and Cambodia where carp are revered and valued but also endangered

programme.title: Timbavati: Lavlji ep
programme.desc: Some of Africa's most formidable predators live in family groups. We follow the lives of three of these - lion, wild dog and hyena - as they cross paths in Timbavati, near Kruger. The Timbavati pride is a newly formed coalition of three lion brothers, three lionesses and their newborn cubs. In comparison, the Sohebeles have lost their father and their territory. The 5 youngsters are left to their own devices. We compare the structure of the lions' family group to a pack of wild dogs that visit the Timbavati, and the local hyena clan, lead by a powerful matriarch. All three families work in very different ways with one purpose- survival

programme.title: 72 opasne životinje Australije
programme.desc: What lurks beneath the water's surface could have you fighting for your life. Meet 6 of our 72 'Dangerous Animals' inflicting pain and changing lives forever

programme.title: 72 opasne životinje Australije
programme.desc: A battle of the miniscule itchy grub, the highly unique platypus and the mammoth water buffalo… expect nothing but pain from all three. But, which animal will top the 72 list this week

programme.title: Odiseja velikih mačaka
programme.desc: Over 30 years ago Dereck and Beverly Joubert, National Geographic Explorers in Residence, went out of a quest to understand big cats. They worked through the night, droughts and floods following lions and then leopards trying to piece together the puzzle of what makes cats unique in this environment

programme.title: Divlji jelovnik
programme.desc: Fruits come in all shapes and sizes, colors, aromas, and flavors, but they all share a common purpose: they're meant to attract animals and entice them to spread the seeds of the plants that produce them

programme.title: Divlji jelovnik
programme.desc: Some may prefer their steak well-done, but it takes a certain kind of animal to enjoy their meats rotting. Meat that's a little "past its prime" has lots of fans. In fact, there's a strange group of animals known as scavengers, carrion-feeders, or necrophages, whose purpose is to eliminate corpses that invade the earth, the rivers, and the sea every day

programme.title: 72 opasne životinje Australije
programme.desc: Biting, stinging and tearing… drawing blood is what these animals do best. Beware, danger lurks all around

programme.title: Anakonda
programme.desc: Few snakes are feared more and understood less than the anaconda. The film shows the journey into remote and uncharted parts of the Amazon rainforest to find the truth behind the mythical beast. Lush green forests abound with colorful toucans, noisy howler monkeys, strange tapirs, and vibrant Amazon Indian tribes. But hiding in the dense vegetation and murky swamps is also the biggest and most powerful snake in the world: the anaconda

programme.title: Pecanje čudovišta
programme.desc: Dr. Zeb Hogan travels down under to find an aquatic Australian icon - the Murray Cod - and to uncover why it has virtually disappeared from its namesake waterway - the Murray River. The race is on as scientists, conservationists and anglers join forces to keep these legendary monster fish alive

programme.title: Najveći svjetski ubojice
programme.desc: The animal world is full of predators who can kill in the blink of an eye. These are the World's Deadliest: Speed Kills -- and they dish out death like fast food. From the fleet-footed cheetah, to the stargazer fish that swallows prey in a tenth of a second, to the venomous black mamba -- the fastest and deadliest snake in the world -- Speed Kills puts you in the line of fire to show you the insane speeds at which some creatures kill. Youll witness animal death strikes so fast, they cant even be captured in slow motion

programme.title: Odiseja velikih mačaka
programme.desc: Over 30 years ago Dereck and Beverly Joubert, National Geographic Explorers in Residence, went out of a quest to understand big cats. They worked through the night, droughts and floods following lions and then leopards trying to piece together the puzzle of what makes cats unique in this environment

programme.title: Preporod afričkoga kraljevstva divljine
programme.desc: US-born, African-raised Wildlife Cameraman Bob Poole begins his two-year filming assignment in Gorongosa National Park, Mozambique. After decades of war, an international team of scientists and conservationists is bringing this once-legendary African national park back to its former glory. Poole's first job is to help sedate a lion and put a GPS-tracking collar around its neck. Lion scientist Paola Bouley needs the GPS-data to solve a baffling mystery: why is Gorongosa's lion population not growing as fast as it should

programme.title: 72 opasne životinje Australije
programme.desc: From the sea to the sky to the outback…Expect the unexpected from this bunch of Australia's most dangerous animals

programme.title: 72 opasne životinje Australije
programme.desc: Biting, stinging and tearing… drawing blood is what these animals do best. Beware, danger lurks all around

programme.title: Kobrina mafija
programme.desc: There's a tight-knit snake family that rules reptilian streets with impressive firepower and a fearsome reputation. Equipped with an array of deadly weapons and a bad attitude the Cobra family instills fear and chaos throughout the wilds of Africa and Asia. But who brings what to the table? The King cobra rules this beat, the Boss runs operations on the ground, The Killer and the Spitter do all the dirty work, and The Faker is the out-of-town cousin with a growing reputation

programme.title: Odiseja velikih mačaka
programme.desc: Over 30 years ago Dereck and Beverly Joubert, National Geographic Explorers in Residence, went out of a quest to understand big cats. They worked through the night, droughts and floods following lions and then leopards trying to piece together the puzzle of what makes cats unique in this environment

programme.title: Anakonda

The film shows the journey into remote and uncharted parts of the Amazon rainforest to find the truth behind the mythical beast. Lush green forests abound with colorful toucans, noisy howler monkeys, strange tapirs, and vibrant Amazon Indian tribes. But hiding in the dense vegetation and murky swamps is also the biggest and most powerful snake in the world: the anaconda

programme.title: Pecanje čudovišta
programme.desc: Zeb Hogan is hitting the road and heading down to the Deep South in search of the truth behind the myth of giant catfish. In the swamps and bayous of the southern U.S. there are widely told stories of catfish the size of a car that can swallow a man whole. Zeb is going all in with a cast of characters only found in the Dirty South to see if there really is any truth to this epic urban legend

programme.title: Najsmrtonosnije životinje svijeta
programme.desc: Some of the deadliest predators in the animal kingdom owe their success to the fact that they don't kill alone. World's Deadliest: Packs and Swarms takes a deep dive into the world of group predation with a look at twelve different species that use teamwork to hunt more effectively than they otherwise would be able to alone

programme.title: Gepard
programme.desc: The Cheetah: the world's fastest land animal. Every fiber of its body designed to win the race for survival. We follow the destinies of a young cheetah mother and her first cubs. With determination she has to transform them from adorable kittens into bold, powerful hunters. An epic true story set against the backdrop of one of the wildest places of our planet, Cheetah: Fatal Instinct captures the real-life of the sprinters of the African savannah

programme.title: Preporod afričkoga kraljevstva divljine
programme.desc: Wildlife cameraman Bob Poole has been living in Gorongosa National Park, Mozambique for a while now, and the park's beauty has cast a spell on him. Now, he is forced to confront his fears and his past to team up with his sister Joyce Poole, a world-renowned elephant expert. Together they face charging elephants to uncover brand new insights into their behavior

programme.title: Stvoreni za ubijanje
programme.desc: Lions are 400 pounds of muscle, teeth, and claw. Lion cubs are 4 pounds of blind, toothless, fluff-built not to kill, but to breastfeed. Built for the Kill: Lion follows the transformation of a helpless cub into an accomplished killer, exposing real life and death struggles in dramatic second-by-second detail

programme.title: 72 opasne životinje Australije
programme.desc: From the sea to the sky to the outback…Expect the unexpected from this bunch of Australia's most dangerous animals

programme.title: 72 opasne životinje Australije

programme.title: Divlji jelovnik
programme.desc: The great grasslands of the world serve up a buffet for many species of animals whose digestive systems are specifically designed and adapted to obtain the greatest nutritional value from a plentiful -- but hard to digest -- menu item

programme.title: Divlji jelovnik
programme.desc: Dumpster diving takes on a whole new meaning when opportunistic diners, including gulls, storks, kites, egrets, and foxes, scavenge for meals among urban landfills

programme.title: 72 opasne životinje Australije
programme.desc: Burrowing creepy crawlies, tusked feral boars and the gnashing jaws of the greatest underwater threat explode into the 72 Dangerous Animals list. Fear and loathing in Australia

programme.title: Afrička krvava rijeka
programme.desc: The film examines the classic crocodile/wildebeest confrontation at the Mara River in Tanzania. Filmed with a number of innovative techniques

programme.title: Pecanje čudovišta
programme.desc: Aquatic ecologist Dr Zeb Hogan is on a mission in the Indian Himalayas to investigate disturbing reports of a mammoth sized catfish called a Goonch - accused of stalking, attacking and killing people. (This is OK- I've seen this elsewhere, but any Discovery site is not good.) Zeb enlists the help of local guide and conservationist Vinay Badola, and together they head out to investigate the crime scenes along the Kali River. They'll raft through treacherous white water in an area known by locals as 'the Lost Country', where they meet with eye witnesses who give them detailed accounts of the attacks. Zeb then travels to the Ramganga River, the perfect place to spot and catch some Goonch. Commercial fishing is not allowed here so this river could be harbouring some giant fish. (Also- needs a source) His goal is to catch the Goonch and study its behaviour to determine whether these stories are fact or fiction

programme.title: Najveći svjetski ubojice
programme.desc: These are predators whose appetites exceed any sense of self-control. These are the Worlds Deadliest: Hunger Games. Whether its the Burmese python eating every creature in sight in the Florida everglades; the tiger shark gobbling up giant schools of sardines; or the man-eating Tsavo lion terrorizing the African savannah, Hunger Games shows you animals whose diets never say die

programme.title: Gepard
programme.desc: The Cheetah: the world's fastest land animal. Every fiber of its body designed to win the race for survival. We follow the destinies of a young cheetah mother and her first cubs. With determination she has to transform them from adorable kittens into bold, powerful hunters. An epic true story set against the backdrop of one of the wildest places of our planet, Cheetah: Fatal Instinct captures the real-life of the sprinters of the African savannah

programme.title: Preporod afričkoga kraljevstva divljine
programme.desc: Wildlife cameraman Bob Poole has been living in Gorongosa National Park, Mozambique for a while now, and the park's beauty has cast a spell on him. Now, he is forced to confront his fears and his past to team up with his sister Joyce Poole, a world-renowned elephant expert. Together they face charging elephants to uncover brand new insights into their behavior

programme.title: 72 opasne životinje Australije
programme.desc: From the tiniest to the slimiest, these animals all pack a potent punch. Getting up close and personal is a dangerous game to play

programme.title: 72 opasne životinje Australije
programme.desc: Burrowing creepy crawlies, tusked feral boars and the gnashing jaws of the greatest underwater threat explode into the 72 Dangerous Animals list. Fear and loathing in Australia

programme.title: Crna mamba
programme.desc: Its Silly Season in Mamba Valley and like zombies from their graves, the heat draws Black Mambas from the shadows. They're on the hunt for summer lodgings but as the deadliest snake on the planet, they're not popular neighbors. Many will fall foul to a gunshot or the sharp end of a shovel. But some will be lucky enough to be rescued by a snake wrangling team with a passion for Mambas and a unique facility where these snakes can be housed and observed

programme.title: Gepard
programme.desc: The Cheetah: the world's fastest land animal. Every fiber of its body designed to win the race for survival. We follow the destinies of a young cheetah mother and her first cubs. With determination she has to transform them from adorable kittens into bold, powerful hunters. An epic true story set against the backdrop of one of the wildest places of our planet, Cheetah: Fatal Instinct captures the real-life of the sprinters of the African savannah

programme.desc: Wildlife cameraman Bob Poole has been living in Gorongosa National Park, Mozambique for a while now, and the park's beauty has cast a spell on him. Now, he is forced to confront his fears and his past to team up with his sister Joyce Poole, a world-renowned elephant expert. Together they face charging elephants to uncover brand new insights into their behavior

programme.title: Afrička krvava rijeka
programme.desc: The film examines the classic crocodile/wildebeest confrontation at the Mara River in Tanzania. Filmed with a number of innovative techniques

programme.title: Pecanje čudovišta
programme.desc: Zeb Hogan heads to Alaska to find a legend: a monster run of the world's biggest salmon. But he's got to brave rugged wilderness, icy waters, and hungry bears to do it. Alaska's rivers are teeming with life that influence a multitude of industries and cultures. The various runs of salmon species are vital to the region's economy and lifestyle

programme.title: Najsmrtonosnije životinje svijeta
programme.desc: Sitting high atop the food chain, these are the predators that even predators fear: the Apex Predators. World's Deadliest: Apex Predators takes a fascinating look at the biggest… the baddest… the most fearsome predators in the animal kingdom. These spectacular creatures have won the carnivore's lottery. These are the neighborhood bullies, and they're used to getting their way

programme.title: Životinjski klub boraca
programme.desc: This episode reveals what happens when the Animal Kingdoms biggest and craziest fighters go head to head, and brings you closer than ever before to adrenaline-packed brawls from across the globe. Its a no-holds-barred fight to the death

programme.title: Preporod afričkoga kraljevstva divljine
programme.desc: Bob and the lion team find one of the female cubs with a life-threatening wound. With less than 40 lions in the park, they can't afford to lose one of them. But lions aren't the only ones who need help in Gorongosa. Relocating animals is extremely stressful and dangerous on the animals and the people, but when a park is facing the extinction of its animals, risks are necessary

programme.desc: The film examines the classic crocodile/wildebeest confrontation at the Mara River in Tanzania. Filmed with a number of innovative techniques

But some will be lucky enough to be rescued by a snake wrangling team with a passion for Mambas and a unique facility where these snakes can be housed and observed

programme.title: Životinjski klub boraca
programme.desc: This episode reveals what happens when the Animal Kingdoms biggest and craziest fighters go head to head, and brings you closer than ever before to adrenaline-packed brawls from across the globe. Its a no-holds-barred fight to the death

programme.title: Zvijezde zalagaonice
Pawn stars
programme.desc: U zalagaonicu stiže vojna iskaznica s potpisom Marilyn Monroe. Klijent dolazi s prvim izdanjem Beethovenove 6. simfonije, a Coreyja i Antwauna ulovili su dok su se šuljali tijekom planiranja proslave Chumleejeva rođendana

programme.title: Zvijezde zalagaonice
Pawn stars
programme.desc: U zalagaonicu stiže jakna iz "Paklenog šunda". Corey zapjeva kad u zalagaonicu stignu rukavice za operu s potpisom Clarkea Gablea. Rick odlazi u dom Lonnieja Hammargrena da bi pogledao njegovu zbirku jedinstvenih predmeta

programme.title: Australske zvijezde zalagaonice
programme.desc: Aaron i Shanon odlaze na obalu pogledati bagi za plažu iz 1971. godine. Dečki zatim dobivaju priliku opipati pravi suvenir australskog "rocka", kožnu jaknu koja je, kako tvrdi vlasnik, pripadala Michaelu Hutchenceu

programme.title: Australske zvijezde zalagaonice
programme.desc: Aarona i Shanona posjećuje muškarac koji im donosi staru palicu za kriket te tvrdi da su je potpisali Don Bradman i niz drugih zvijezda kriketa "Bodylinea"

programme.title: Američke restauracije
programme.desc: U radionicu svraća zvijezda zalagaonice Rick Harrison kako bi dao restaurirati stari automat za Pepsi i ostaje zatečen kad otkrije da je jedinstven

programme.title: Američke restauracije
programme.desc: Kad stiže auto marke Custer iz zabavnog parka iz 1930-ih, ekipa se baca na posao

programme.title: Špediterski ratovi
programme.desc: U Dustyju se budi pritajeni šmokljan te naručuje suvenire iz filma "Ratovi zvijezda" i golem kip "Kung Fu pande", dok Samko umalo zaglavi u prošlosti kad pristane prevesti poznati "Pioneerov" autobus koji je vidio bolje dane

programme.title: Špediterski ratovi
programme.desc: S Toddom i Tamerom na čelu, Gumbyjevo putovanje na proslavu 60. godišnjice na kraju je sličnije pogrebu, dok hrpa golemog povrća za koju je "odgovorna" Jenn izgleda kao da je prošla kroz rezalicu

programme.title: Američki "skupljači"
American Pickers
programme.desc: Mike i Frank privlače poglede kad se pojave na ulici u jedinstvenom raketnom automobilu

programme.title: Drvosječe
programme.desc: Pokraj rijeke Shelby odlazi roniti u vode koje vrve aligatorima. Na sjeveru se suparnici Rygaard i Oakes spremaju za borbu na jednosmjernoj cesti, a Rygaardov vozač umalo pogine kad mu se kamion preokrene

programme.title: Zvijezde zalagaonice: Južna Afrika
Pawn stars
programme.desc: Neobični i predivni južnoafrički artefakti od povijesnoga značaja slijevaju se u zalagaonicu dok vlasnik Roy Peretz i njegovi partneri Liel i Eytan svakodnevno izvode vratolomije ne bi li sklopili najbolje poslove
programme.category: Izgubljeni u prijevodu, Sharks and Cobras

programme.title: Špediterski ratovi
programme.desc: Jennifer je pod pritiskom jer mora pomoći spakirati i prevesti model broda koji je izrađivan 10 godina, dok Jarrett ukrcava kutiju s iznimno vrijednim fosilnim ostacima dinosaura starima 65 milijuna godina

programme.title: Kamioni na ledu 2
programme.desc: Kamiondžije se utrkuju s Majkom prirodom dok pokušavaju dostaviti teret prije dolaska oluje stoljeća. Lisa i Art suočeni su sa smrtonosnom zaprekom na ledu, dok bi svađa Darrella i Todda mogla dovesti do raspada ekipe

programme.title: Dinastija patki
programme.desc: U sjedištu tvrtke pokvari se klima uređaj u času kad počne val vrućina. Momci su odlučni u namjeri da se rashlade i kuju ludi plan o gradnji vodenog parka

programme.title: Dinastija patki
programme.desc: Jase, Martin i Godwin odlaze na ribički izlet koji završava kaosom kad Philov čamac potone na dno močvare. U međuvremenu, Willie traži novi auto za svoga sina

programme.title: Drvosječe
programme.desc: Gabe kudi mamurnog žutokljunca, ali Jason se ne slaže s njegovim stilom vođenja posla. Borba za premoć na rijeci i dalje bjesni dok se članovi ekipe Chapman međusobno svađaju, a Dreadknotsi se vode onom "zavadi pa vladaj"

programme.title: Ljudi iz močvare
programme.desc: Troy i Teksašani postavili su sebi visoke ciljeve. U međuvremenu jedan tim preuzima rizik koji ugrožava cijelu njihovu sezonu i Liz se suočava s ozbiljnom zdravstvenom krizom

programme.title: Gorštaci
programme.desc: Ova emisija prikazuje različite pojedince od Apalačkog gorja preko Stjenjaka do Aljaske i prati ih dok se hvataju ukoštac sa zimom kako bi došli do potrepština i novca koji su im potrebni da prežive najhladnije mjesece u godini
